title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\DataplexTableSpec
name: DataplexTableSpec
description:
Entry specification for a Dataplex table.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.DataplexTableSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.external_tables
params.description: List of external tables registered by Dataplex in other systems based on the same underlying data. External tables allow to query this data in those systems.

params.name: data.user_managed
params.description: Indicates if the table schema is managed by the user or not.
